name: ARKK Momentum Strategy Crash Analysis
question: How would a momentum strategy on ARKK have performed during the 2021-2022 growth stock crash?
retailQuestion: Would following trends on ARKK have saved me from the crash?
description: Analyzes a momentum-based strategy on ARK Innovation ETF during the major growth stock selloff from early 2021 to 2022. Tests whether momentum indicators could have provided early exit signals before the 75%+ decline and evaluates re-entry timing during the recovery phase.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 2020-2023 ARKK daily price data covering the full cycle
Step 2: Get current ARKK market data for recovery context
Step 3: Calculate momentum indicators and generate crash-protection signals
Step 4: Backtest strategy through crash and recovery with timing analysis
Step 5: Compare momentum strategy vs buy-and-hold during the crisis
